tasks.task: Setting up and maintaining a sustainable shrimp farming system
subtasks: Installing solar panels to power pumps
Operating water pumps to circulate through the biofilter
Understanding and adjusting water chemical composition using the biofilter
Maintaining shrimp habitats with substrate and mesh enclosures
Feeding shrimp twice a day with specific feed
Monitors shrimp growth and stocking levels
Calculating potential yield and economic feasibility
Sharing project details and resources for backyard shrimp farming
